Uses of Interface
com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager.PersistenceUnitConfig

    • Uses of PersistenceUnitConfig in com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager

      Methods in com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager that return PersistenceUnitConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PersistenceUnitConfig PersistenceUnitConfig.addJarFileUrls(URL url, URL... urls)
      Specifies URLs for any jar files or exploded jar file directories that the persistence provider must examine for managed classes of the persistence unit.
      PersistenceUnitConfig PersistenceUnitConfig.addMappingFileNames(String fileName, String... fileNames)
      Specifies any mapping files that must be loaded to determine the mappings for the entity classes.
      PersistenceUnitConfig PersistenceUnitConfig.setExcludeUnlistedClasses(boolean excludeUnlistedClasses)
      Specifies whether classes in the root of the persistence unit that have not been explicitly listed are to be included in the set of managed classes.
      PersistenceUnitConfig PersistenceUnitConfig.setProperty(String property, String value)
      Specifies a property value to be used by the persistence provider for the persistence unit.
      PersistenceUnitConfig PersistenceUnitConfig.setSharedCacheMode(javax.persistence.SharedCacheMode sharedCacheMode)
      Specifies how the provider must use a second-level cache for the persistence unit.
      PersistenceUnitConfig PersistenceUnitConfig.setValidationMode(javax.persistence.ValidationMode validationMode)
      Specifies the validation mode to be used by the persistence provider for the persistence unit.
      Methods in com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager with parameters of type PersistenceUnitConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void EntityManagerBundle.configure(PersistenceUnitConfig configuration)
      Override to configure the JPA persistence unit.
